resources.string: Information about your device,account and this app will be automatically included in this report. To learn more about how your information is used,please see our Data Use Policy.

To all the students of Arya Mess : Let me set the scene your friend John is rushing to get his daughter from school and his son to the soccer field, and he still needs to stop at the grocery store because there’s nothing in the fridge. In the midst of this everyday madness, he gets a text message from Google with a verification code. He thinks, “That’s weird. Maybe I should log in to my email and see what’s going on.” Regards The Ganga Hostel Mess Team
